name: Deaht Scrolls
description:
If you have any suggestions or found a bug please tell me!

Version history: 1.0.1: Maintenance release Tweaked Player movement to be less slippery Fixed a typo in the Credits Shrinked Hitboxes on Spikes 1.0: Release!

Newgrounds version: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/878091

Note for Mac Users: Since I don't own a Mac the Mac Build is currently in a experimental state until it has been verified to work, play at your own risk!

Introducing...

Deaht Scrolls! A captivating sequel to the game "Deaht Strings," which was originally created for a game jam on Scratch. The new game is designed to address the feedback and criticism received for the original installment.

In this game, you take on the role of a cube named "Cueb" (see image below) whose sole objective is to complete easy but challenging levels. However, Cueb has a unique ability to "Ghostify" itself whenever it sustains damage, which allows you to traverse through walls marked in red.

New features in this release

There also exists new features in this release such as the "trampoline" which allows you to go higher than what you would usually get by simply jumping. There is also a "Gravity Pull" that allows you to hit the ground faster (be careful with this one though, it's recommended to use this feature sparingly).

Pro Tip: It doesn't actually matter were you jump so jumping in the air is possible, but you only get one jump before needing to hit the ground again, you can get a extra jump by ether collecting a heart or hitting a trampoline.
